archimate:Node.name: [L1 NCSA] NCSA Distributors ITC (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: During prompt processing, each forwarder node at the Base is paried with a distributor node at NCSA. Nominally there is one such pair for every raft in LSSTCam while the system is performing Prompt PRocessing. A working system has spare distributor nodes, to allow for the failure a distributor Node.
